SAND Copenhagen implements Apps4Fashion

‹ back to news overview
We warmly welcome SAND Copenhagen as they have selected Apps4Fashion as their mobile B2B e-commerce platform.
With this premium quality brand we are very proud to service another leading Danish fashion company with our mobile sales tools and to make the ordering process more efficient for sales reps, agents as well as the retail customers, improve the go-to-market approach and contribute to a better sales performance. 

The design of the Danish Fashion house SAND is driven by passion, creativity and innovation. What started in the 80 ́s, until today grew into an international fashion brand. Cool Scandinavian silhouettes combined with southern European charm to maintain its provocative, sophisticated focus – SAND creates clothes for the way world citizens think, work and live.

Apps4Fashion is the leading international mobile sales platform for Fashion, Sports, Kidswear, Footwear, Body Fashion and Accessory  brands, agents and distributors. Currently over 300 international brands and suppliers like Scotch & Soda, Denham, PME Legend, Julie Brandt, Mark Berg, Container, By Malene Birger, Dea Kudibal, Second Female, Tiger of Sweden, Custommade, Peak Performance, O'Neill, Haglöfs, Asics, J.Lindeberg, Lexington and many more are using our mobile sales tools.

Apps4Fashion has been successfully integrated with all kind of ERP, PIM and other back 0ffice systems like SAP, several versions of Navision, Microsoft Dynamics NAV,  Microsoft Dynamics AX, Concorde, XAL, Garp, Exact,  M3, Softwear, Trimmit, K3 Pebblestone Fashion, XL-Enz, It Suits Fashion, C5, Styleman, ACA, Becosoft, Apparel21, DiatexNT, E-conomic, InRiver etc.

We are happy to explain you more about Apps4Fashion and demonstrate what it can do for you. For more information www.apps4fashion.com or email to robert@apps4fashion.com
Official Apps4Fashion partners are Agidon A/S (Denmark), Dekon IT AS (Norway) and GC Support AS (Norway/Sweden), NaviPro AB (Sweden),  Impuls Software Systeme GmbH (Germany) and Intex EDV-Software GmbH(Germany)
